subject: How to get the Connection Pool in my test cases
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am using tomcat connection pool to connect the database and also i am using the hibernate for configuration. How can I get the connection pool in my
messageBody:
Hi All,

I am using tomcat connection pool to connect the database and
also i am using the hibernate for configuration.

How can I get the connection pool in my test cases.Please
anybody clarify my doubt.

Thanks & Regards,
Thanuja.
